ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Failed to select UUID with SpecificDBType
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Add a new column 2. Select ``SpecficDBType`` in Column Type 3. Select ``uuid`` in Type in Database 4. It will switch to ``SingleLineText`` in Column Type and empty in Type in Database **Expected behavior** It should use ``uuid`` instead of ``SingleLineText`` **Screenshots** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/124760192-11e66400-df63-11eb-8e0a-bc8e9079a6b0.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/124760223-1b6fcc00-df63-11eb-9539-3cc44bf2aee8.png) Node: **v12.22.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.9.42**

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): Avoid type change on column datatype selection re #332 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
